snippet: By making one daring proposal, John Boehner, the House speaker, could have himself re-invited to the negotiating table for the nation’s economic future.
abstract: Richard H Thaler Economic View contends for House Speaker John Boehner to restore his relevance, he should propose that the debt ceiling be raised for at least two years or, even better, propose that it be abolished; holds that Boehner and Republicans backing him would be signaling they are willing to engage in serious discussions the country needs, and Democrats would have pressure to do likewise.
lead_paragraph: By making one daring proposal, John Boehner, the House speaker, could have himself re-invited to the negotiating table for the nation’s economic future.

headline.print_headline: Above the Debt Ceiling, Boehner Might Find a Blue Sky
headline.seo: How Boehner Could Find Blue Sky, Above the Debt Ceiling
